content: this is a chart only no written instructions this wall hanging was inspired by the troubling response of the federal administration and broadcast media following the death of alex pretti at the hands of ice agents in minneapolis mn january 24 2026 when facts are still so quickly manipulated and misinformation spreads like a virus we must trust our eyes and also our hearts the chart is flexible for any yarn just use an appropriately sized needle i used knitpicks brava worsted weight yarn on size 9s i chose to work a third color over the lenses using an intarsia technique with bobbins at the color changes i d love to see anything that you make with this i m a long-time and very proud south minneapolis resident and i am hoping for a better future for us
